note.p: Dental surgeon. In partnership with Francis Ewbank, at 24 Queen Anne Street, London, 1881. Committed suicide.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/674/16/23), 1891 (RG12/93/83/19)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 27 September 2019)
Otautau Standard and Wallace County Chronicle, 5 February 1907, p. 3
